text: Cerberiopsis candelabra - MHNT Cerberiopsis is a genus of plant in the family Apocynaceae, first described as a genus in 1873. The entire group is endemic to New Caledonia. The genus is related to Cerbera.Potgieter, K., and V. A. Albert. (2001) Phylogenetic Relationships within Apocynaceae S.l. Based on trnL Intron and trnL-F Spacer Sequences and Propagule Characters.” Annals of the Missouri Botanical Garden 88 (4): 523–49. ==List of species== # Cerberiopsis candelabra Vieill. ex Pancher & Sebert # Cerberiopsis neriifolia (S. Moore) Boiteau # Cerberiopsis obtusifolia (Van Heurck & F. Muell.) Boiteau ==References== Category:Apocynaceae genera Category:Endemic flora of New Caledonia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
